Name Gloss ACHIEVING POWER IS MOVING UPWARDS
Name Transcription
Aliases
Description
Comments
Tags mapping, tentative
Family Governance metaphors
Metaphor Level
Metaphor Type
Experiential Basis
Cultural Scope
Source Frame Upward motion
Roles:mover, motion_x-schema, downward_direction, source, goal, mover_position, speed
Target Frame Power
Roles:Power_holder, Power_yielder


Mappings:

Power_holder <= mover

Related Metaphors:

Current Metaphor ACHIEVING POWER IS MOVING UPWARDS
Relation Type is an entailment of
Related Metaphor CONTROL IS UP
Description

Entailments:


Examples:

Example Text: Hitler's rise to power cannot be attributed to one event, but a mixture of factors including events happening outside Germany...

Comments:
Example Text: Regensburg’s political influence reached its peak when Regensburg was city of the Perpetual Diet or General Assembly of the Imperial Estates of the Holy Roman Empire from 1663 to 1806.
